evidence.claim: Generations at Home utilizes AWS for cloud services including Lambda and S3.
They maintain HIPAA compliance for all health-related data processes.
Generations at Home handles EDI transactions for insurance claims using X12 standards.
The company employs HL7 FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
Generations at Home follows an API-first approach for their software integration.

icp.icp_reason: Generations at Home supports X12 transactions with HIPAA compliance, indicating API-first integration needs.
